website_summaries.verdict: These adorable ankle boots feature a hiker-style bootie with contrasting laces and a faux fur tongue for ultimate style.
pros: Extremely comfortable for walking around all day
cons: Not the warmest shoe if you are looking for winter boots

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes! Worth the buy! I got a size 8.5 and they fit just perfect. There wasn't many reviews so I was iffy about this purchase but it came exactly how it looked in the pictures so don't hesitate on this one 😁❤
customer_reviews.author: cj anton

customer_reviews.title: Great boots and a great look
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots and I receive compliments whenever I wear them. Less expensive than in the store where I first saw them. These are fashionable and cute. Not for keeping your feet really warm or for hiking - these are for looks and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this cute boots one time and the eyelet broke. Please don’t waste your money. Very disappointed Amazon for selling an inferior product. I bought the on sale last year and didn’t wear them until it was cold.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Waymire

customer_reviews.title: not only are they super cute, they also took me walking around Philadelphia ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I purchased these boots the day before a trip that I knew was going to involve a lot of walking. They were exactly what I was looking for so I couldn’t pass them up. Well, not only are they super cute, they also took me walking around Philadelphia for two days (around 8 miles per day) straight without even a hint of a blister. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Howard

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. My only small issue with this boot is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. My only small issue with this boot is that the last few laces are set on hooks (not sure of the exact phrase) in stead of through the holes. This makes them more difficult to lace up. Not too big of a deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These boots are amazing! I’m a size 9 and they fit true ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing! I’m a size 9 and they fit true to size. I’m lookimg forward to pairing with jeans and wearing on my next ski trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ezinger

customer_reviews.title: The fit and feel is nice. I receive complements every time I wear them
customer_reviews.text: My new go-to winter jeans boots. The fit and feel is nice. I receive complements every time I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit well very nice. Color of sand for sure. More Jersey sand color if that helps :) True to size for me. Nice soft fur in front. Long shoelaces.
customer_reviews.author: NINA

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. Exactly what I expected them to be. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JH1234

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful boot! It also has the perfect
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful boot! It also has the perfect, no break-in required Sam Edelman fit and quality. Saw them online and knew I had to have them! Delivered promptly as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Get many compliments on them. I’m a size 8 with a narrow foot and they fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila White

customer_reviews.title: My favorite boots!
customer_reviews.text: These were comfortable right out of the box and have become my favorite boots. So very cute....I just love them!
customer_reviews.author: MntMom

product_meta.title: Sam Edelman Women's Darrah 2 Hiker Boots
product_meta.description:
Hiker style bootie with contrasty laces and faux fur tongue

Sam Edelman shoes epitomize chic comfort. With exceptional materials and fine styling, each pair of Sam Edelman shoes is an affordable luxury that cleverly combines a youthful outlook with a worldly sensibility. Sophistication with down-to-earth appeal mean that these shoes are made to be lived in. Whether it's a classic revisited for a modern interpretation or a cutting edge design, Sam Edelman shoes always keep an emphasis on comfort.
